name: Ridiculous Bombing Game
description:
RIDICULOUS BOMBING GAME :: Coming 2020

Get Your Mayhem Fix.

Unleash the inner pyromanic and blow everything to smithereens.
Or simply plant trees! Your choice, just saying.

  • Solve puzzles, fight enemies, or just relax in this sandboxy action-puzzle 3D platformer.
  • Originally a gamejam prototype, it is now being developed into a full-length experience.
  • All footage is heavy pre-alpha and not in any way resembling of the final product.
  • You can follow the development on my Twitter and Youtube accounts listed in the sidebar.
